Articles.Content: Hi, im really into using the SPH, and I want to try it out as it was first introduced.  If you have bought the game, shouldn't you be able to download older versions, not just newer ones?
Sorry for the late reply: I have previously found that, but I forgot to mention I was looking for .15 and up.(has old SPH) I do like how the game has evolved.

Unless you have the game when those came out, it's going to be pretty hard t get ahold of those versions. 0.13 and under were the free versions, but 0.14 and above you had to pay for, and are basically illegal to distribute. So, unless you have a friend who owns the 0.15 version, I can't help you.

But, I agree that it would be cool to be able to select the version you want to play, or if you've bought the game you should be able to download earlier versions.
